name: The Maze!
description:
How did you end up in this maze?

Collect the gems to unlock the door and escape. But be warned, you're not in the maze alone.

You must find three gems while avoiding the roaming beast. You will be able to hear it's footsteps if you listen carefully. You can also use the scryring stations to get a quick view of your surroundings to help orient yourself or avoid the beast.

I hope you have fun and good luck!
